snippet.title: [ROM Hack] Castlevania: Dawn of Sorrow - Definitive Edition+ (v2.0, Definitive Mode)
snippet.description:
*I WILL NOT BE RELEASING A PRE-PATCHED ROM, YOU'LL HAVE TO USE A ROM PATCHER THAT SUPPORTS XDELTA3 PATCHES LIKE XDELTA UI OR A SIMILAR PATCHER:* https://www.romhacking.net/utilities/598/
https://kotcrab.github.io/xdelta-wasm/

RHDN page of the hack: https://www.romhacking.net/hacks/5610/

Readme TXT: https://www.romhacking.net/hacks/ds/patches/5610readme.txt.

This is a showcase video of version 2.0, of my Castlevania: Dawn of Sorrow - Definitive Edition+ is ROM hack that serves as a vastly improved version of the original Definitive Edition hack. 

This hack has a myriad of improvements, such as bug fixes, Quality of Life, and rebalancing changes to create the best way to play Dawn of Sorrow. 

Check out the readme TXT or the PDF within the 7Z archive for a list of every change made from the original Definitive Edition hack and in the added Definitive Mode of v2.0, excluding very minor changes like the de-capitalization of a letter or the removal of an extra space, or just summarizing some of the changes for the sake of not making the readme longer than it already is. (^^; 

There are many patches in the 7Z archive, the Main Patches that include the Definitive Edition+ patches along with the Definitive Mode ones, and the Optional Patches which are miscellaneous changes that can be applied to a Dawn of Sorrow ROM with one of the main patches already applied for some customization options. 

This hack only needs to be patched to a clean ROM of Dawn of Sorrow with a ROM patcher compatible with XDELTA3 files.
